text: Ọsanyin (Yoruba: Ọ̀sanyìn, rendered Osaín/Ossain/Ossaím in Latin America) is the one-eyed, one-armed, one-legged orisha of healing herbs. In America he is syncretized with Saint Joseph. ==References== Category:Yoruba gods Category:Health gods Category:Santería Category:Candomblé
title: Ọsanyìn
